inlineImageAndParagraph.text: Decentro's Phonetic Name Matching API, a core component of the Farsight Data Forensics suite, offers a robust solution for precise customer identity verification. It intelligently matches names despite variations, typos, or regional pronunciations, significantly enhancing KYC, streamlining onboarding, and bolstering fraud prevention efforts.

items.description: Utilises advanced phonetic algorithms to convert names into a phonetic representation, allowing for accurate comparisons irrespective of spelling discrepancies or common typos.
Compares the phonetic representations to identify matches, even when names have minor variations, regional pronunciations, or deliberate alterations, ensuring high accuracy.
Allows businesses to define specific matching strictness levels, adapting the API's sensitivity to align with their unique risk appetite and compliance requirements.
